'''Arama''' is an [[Aranara]] and quest-exclusive [[NPC]] located in [[Vanarana (Subarea)]], [[Sumeru]]. He first appears in the {{Quest|The World of Aranara}} where he watches the [[Traveler]] approach the [[Phantasmal Gate]] in Vanarana and later meets them when they entered "their world" by using the [[Vintage Lyre]].<ref>{{Ref/Quest|The World of Aranara}}''</ref>

In the {{Quest|For All Children Who Long for Life}}, Arama becomes a seed and grows into a new [[Ashvattha Tree]], allowing the Traveler to obtain the [[Bija]].

===Appearance===
Arama has a pale green body and has an antenna-like feature with a yellow flower on its head. It has a red scarf around its neck along with two small buttons on its body. It has two leaf-like features over its head. Like all Aranara, Arama has a smiling face all the time.

== Trivia ==
=== Etymology ===
* Arama is derived from {{W|Rama}}, the protagonist of the Sanskrit epic {{W|Ramayana}}, fitting their role as the protagonist in the Aranyaka World Quest series.
